about_the_game:
This layout covers the last 19 miles of the Healesville line from Mooroolbark to Healesville, set in approximately 1913-1920, prior to the line to Lilydale being electrified, and during the period when the locomotives were painted Canadian Red.

This line features changing grades, the famous 'Tunnel Hill' tunnel and multiple bridges. Some of the highlights along the line include the Cave Hill quarry; the Tunnel Hill runnel, and the 1.5 mile long bridge over the Yarra Flats floodplain and Yarra River near the township of Yarra Glen.
detailed_description:
This layout covers the last 19 miles of the Healesville line from Mooroolbark to Healesville, set in approximately 1913-1920, prior to the line to Lilydale being electrified, and during the period when the locomotives were painted Canadian Red.

This line features changing grades, the famous 'Tunnel Hill' tunnel and multiple bridges. Some of the highlights along the line include the Cave Hill quarry; the Tunnel Hill runnel, and the 1.5 mile long bridge over the Yarra Flats floodplain and Yarra River near the township of Yarra Glen.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

name: Trainz Plus DLC - Healesville 1910's

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese
